text: The Yaqui flag is the official flag of the Yaqui people, an Indigenous nation in Sonora, Mexico and Arizona in the United States of America. () is a tricolor of blue, white, and red with a cross charged in the center of the white stripe with up a moon and down a sun. This flag there are four yellow stars. ==Related pages== * Yaqui people ==References== Yaqui Yaqui Category:Ethnic flags
title: Yaqui flag
